channel.title: 1 server for 5 minutes?
channel.description: I downloaded Mopar today and tried it on the web. On the web, I can never get on. After downloading it, I can get onto one server, the devon.com one.... However, after 5 minutes of playing, the program acts like its lagging and then kicks me off. After trying to get back on, I repeatedly failed to. Also, If i exit and restart the program, I can get onto a different account for another 5 minutes before it shuts down. ALSO<<<(getting old)>>>>> , when I am on, I can only get certain items by using pickup. It says that it is the wrong syntax for items like dragon 2h.

item.title: 1 server for 5 minutes?

ye some owners restart servers every 5,10,15 mins lmao
i restart myn every 1 hour.
auto-restarter 0WNZ

@Steph1 wrote:

Everything is right, your just typing it wrong.
But… For the 5 Minutes of Playing, no Idea. Check your firewall, and see if it’s blocking MoparScape.
